content:
:email: Let me kindly invite you to the CLAIRE Offices 2021 Opening Roadshow.

On its mission to ensure the success of ‚ÄúAI made in Europe‚Äù, CLAIRE is celebrating its reach across Europe by launching four new offices in Zurich, Oslo, Paris and Brussels in an Office Launch Roadshow. These new offices complement the four existing CLAIRE offices in The Hague, Prague, Rome and Saarbr√ºcken.

The Office Launch Roadshow will be held in a series of virtual events starting on 26 May at the new Swiss CLAIRE Office in Z√ºrich. The series continues with the Norwegian CLAIRE Office, on 03 June in Oslo, followed by the French CLAIRE Office in Paris, on 17 June, and culminates in the launch of the Belgian CLAIRE Office in Brussels, on 25 June.

:point_right: More information and registration links: https://claire-ai.org/offices-roadshow/

Which of our 4 new Offices Events are you going to watch? Zurich, Oslo, Paris, Brussels, or all of them?

Watch our teaser and join us from May 26 ‚Äì June 25: YouTube - CLAIRE Offices Opening Roadshow 2021

CLAIRE Offices 2021 Opening Roadshow is here!
The 1st of 4 new CLAIRE offices is officially opening tomorrow (26 May) - CLAIRE | Zurich!

Join us for the special event, meet the Swiss AI community, CLAIRE representatives, and do not miss this opportunity for networking in virtual rooms.

:point_right: Event page and registration:https://bit.ly/3hAsaBk

Swiss AI4Good ‚Äì Building a Nexus between Research, Innovation & Society
CLAIRE Office Opening Roadshow: AI4Good ‚Äì Building a Nexus between Research, Innovation and Society

The CLAIRE Offices Opening Roadshow is in full swing! Up next: CLAIRE | Oslo with The Nordic Model - Connecting Young Talent. Join us on 3 June at 3:00 PM CEST.

:point_right: Oslo Video Teaser: https://bit.ly/2SzcBzj

:point_right: Registration link: https://bit.ly/3i23Ic3

Welcome! You are invited to join a webinar: CLAIRE Oslo Office Launch. After registering, you will receive a confirmation email about joining the webinar.
Building pan-European bridges, Confederation of Laboratories for Artificial Intelligence Research in Europe (CLAIRE) is celebrating its reach across Europe by launching four new offices in Zurich, Oslo, Paris and Brussels in a month long Office Opening Roadshow beginning on May 26 to strengthen the CLAIRE Vision of inclusive and co-creative collaboration for responsible AI research and education all across Europe. The new offices will complement the 4 existing offices in The Hague, Saarbrucken, Rome and Prague. AI is increasingly present in all aspects of academia, industry and daily life, which is why all stakeholders need to take part in the way the field is being framed. AI technologies will also have a global impact on societies. Thus, an international and European approach to AI is thus needed. To promote this approach nationally, NORA is thrilled to announce the official opening of the CLAIRE Oslo Office. Please join the launching event The Nordic Model from 3:00‚Äì5:00 pm on June 3rd 2021. This will give you the opportunity to learn more about CLAIRE and the Oslo office but also about activities and partnerships that the office is particularly involved in.

:eight_pointed_star: Today is the Official CLAIRE | Oslo Office Launch! :eight_pointed_star:

:point_right: Do not miss it: https://www.nora.ai/events/NORA-claire-oslo-office-launch

Meet us at üïì 15:00 CEST

This event, titled The Nordic Model: Connecting Young Talent, will give you the opportunity to learn more about CLAIRE and the Oslo office but also about activities and partnerships that the office is particularly involved in.

CLAIRE Oslo Office Launch - The Nordic Model: Connecting Young Talent - NORA - Norwegian Artificial Intelligence Research Consortium
